description: Learn how to make this cheesy risotto with roasted pumpkin and grated zucchini. It’s a dish the whole family will love.
keywords: Pumpkin risotto,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Pumpkin,Sesame free,Zucchini,Quick & easy dinner,Soy free,Wheat free,Rice,Peanut free
name: Cheesy Pumpkin Risotto Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180°C. Line a baking tray with baking paper.
Spread pumpkin onto prepared tray and bake for 20 minutes or until golden. Remove from oven and roughly mash with fork.

Meanwhile, heat oil in a medium frying pan over high heat. Add onion, garlic and rosemary and sauté for 1 minute. Add rice and cook, stirring, for 1 minute or until grains are translucent. Add stock and 3 cups of water and stir well to distribute rice. Reduce heat to low, cover and simmer for 15 minutes. Remove lid and stir, replace lid, and cook for a further 5 minutes or until rice is al dente.
Fold through zucchini and pumpkin and cook for 2 minutes or until reduced. Fold through ricotta and parmesan and divide among bowls to serve.
